children.text: Please cite us in your publication if dictyBase/DSC helped you achieve your results. Thank you!

If GenBank sequence entries are to be cited, the citation should include the sequence name and GenBank accession number. For example: The GenBank accession number for the sequence reported in this paper is U12980.
The GenBank accession number for the full genome sequence is AAFI00000000.
